faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 2BHK flat in Sector 86 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The price range for a 2BHK flat in Sector 86 varies significantly based on the builder, the specific project amenities, the exact location within the sector, and whether the unit is newly constructed or resale. Generally, well-appointed 2BHK units start from approximately 75 lakhs and can go up to 120 lakhs depending on the luxury quotient and floor level. It is essential to consult our property experts for the most current and accurate pricing based on your specific requirements and budget.

faqs.question: Are most 2BHK projects in Sector 86 RERA approved
faqs.answer: Yes, almost all reputable and ongoing residential projects offering a 2BHK flat for sale in Sector 86 Gurugram are mandatory RERA registered. RERA registration ensures transparency, mandates timely project completion, and protects buyer interests through strict regulatory compliance. We strongly advise buyers to only consider properties with valid RERA certification for complete legal security and peace of mind regarding their investment.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes available for a 2BHK flat in this sector
faqs.answer: The super area for 2BHK flats in Sector 86 generally ranges from 950 square feet to 1350 square feet. The variation depends on the specific design layout of the builder. Smaller units focus primarily on efficiency, while larger configurations often include premium features like an extra utility balcony or a dedicated study niche. Always verify the carpet area versus the super area before finalizing your purchase.
